traits.name: Age
traits.description: Elves reach physical maturity at the same age as humans, but claim adulthood around 100 years old. They can live up to 750 years.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Elves range from under 5 to over 6 feet tall and have slender builds. Your size is Medium.

traits.name: Keen Senses
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

traits.name: Trance
traits.description: Elves do not sleep but enter a meditative state for 4 hours a day. This functions as a long rest.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: You have disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight when in direct sunlight.

traits.name: Drow Weapon Training
traits.description: You have proficiency with rapiers, shortswords, and hand crossbows.
